step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Ensure your shoulder is stable.
Excellent! Keep your arm fully extended overhead. Focus on maintaining that position.
Great job opening your hand and fingers wide. Remember to relax your muscles here.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Visualize the fluid movement.
Second rep, great! Continue to hold your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch.
Perfectly extended arm overhead. Keep up the good work maintaining this position.
Nicely done opening your hand wide. Remember to relax your hand and arm muscles.
Fantastic! You're making a strong fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale. Keep visualizing the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Overhead Pumping exercise! You consistently kept your arm straight overhead and opened your hand wide. Remember to focus on making a tight fist while inhaling and relaxing as you exhale to maximize lymph flow.
